titleStmt.title: An assistance to justices of the peace, for the easier performance of their duty. By Jos. Keble, of Grays Inn, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Keble, Joseph, 1632-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Rawlins, S. Roycroft, and H. Sawbridge, Assigns of R. and E. Atkins Esq; for Samuel Keble at the Turks Head over against Fetter Lane End in Fleet-street.

notesStmt.note: "We do Allow the Printing and Publishing of this Book ... Fr. Pemberton, Fra. North, W. Mountagu, Hugh Wyndham, [and 8 others]." -- facing t.p.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford0. Library.
